name: City Bomber Plane Attack
description:
Fly on steep planes on a complex urban area and destroy high-rises.
Unlock maximum points to achieve higher levels with more complex urban development.

Game features:
Suitable for all ages.
Great graphics.
Realistic soundtrack aircraft.
Simple control.
Incredibly fun gameplay.
All levels are free.
It is possible to share the maximum result with friends.

The main enemy in the game is time, lead the race with time, break buildings faster than your plane drops. If you do not have time to clear the field for landing and come across buildings - your game is over. So go ahead for the race with time!
